Title: Series: The Life of the Virgin
Description: Modern impression; the Adoration of the Virgin; the Virgin, sitting in an architectural space, surrounded by saints and angels one playing a harp, among them St Catherine, St Jerome, St Anthony and St John the Baptist, in the foreground putti chasing a hare and holding empty escutcheons Engraving
Curator's comments: After a series of 20 woodcuts on the Life of the Virgin by Albrecht Dürer. For impressions by Dürer on same subject see E.3.92 and 1895,0122.640 and for impression with Latin text see 1895,0122.660 and E.2.190.
Associated names: Representation of: St Catherine of Siena
Representation of: St John the Baptist (Prodromos)
Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
Acquisition notes: 1860,0414.464 to 480 were all given by John Philp, and were entered as modern impressions from the plates of Marcantonio's copies of Dürer's 'Life of the Virgin'.
